English: Everon hills
One month later, Everon
Volkov, Zubarev, Burtsov, Moltov, Limyen, Garodsky, Yenotov, Dyrbov, Aspidov and Shvernik...
Some of the names I recognize from the old times. Most in the army, but there are politicnas and powerful party members too.
A clique of sorts? There is no obvious connection. They do support common resolutions, but that could be coincidence.\nIs this everything Stas got out of Moscow?

Ah, think Grigory, think! Volkov needed reinforcements... remote islands in the middle of the Pacific... the fastest plane can get here in twelve hours.\nLetters take weeks to deliver... There are only handful of radios capable of such a long distance...
Far away and isolated... At the end of the world...
Everon... Although an epicentre for both wars, it is not the price. The island is between Malden and Kolguyev.\nWhoever controls it can launch attacks against the other.
Everon is only a stepping stone. A launching pad for the true invasion - of Malden.
Whatever Volkov desires is on Malden. But what in the world is it?
You used to be sharp, Grigory. You let yourself go too much.
Ghosts of the past still haunt me, I see. Am I going crazy again?

I would not call you crazy yet, although you are not very far off. Lack of sleep, empty stomach, stressed, frustrated and fighting in a conflict you have no desire to be part of.\nSome might call it sad.
I truly needed a hallucination of my old friend to remind me.
Old friend, you say? I stopped being your friend the moment you shot me in the head.
Or did you forget?
Never. But I did believe your death would end this madness. That it would bring peace.
Ha ha, you are blind. You thought you solved the issue but now the current of events is once again leading to the grand finale you are so afraid of.
You can slow it down, postpone it, but fate will still find you whenever you hide and force you to face your judgment. It is inevitable.
You speak nonsense. I will not let you get away with this.\nI, Grigory Lemontov, will put stop to your schemes. I will kill every last follower of yours if I have to, but you shall not succeed!
Begone, ghost!
I truly am going crazy...
